gobblin.config.store.api

Interface ConfigStoreFactory<T extends ConfigStore>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The java class of the ConfigStore implementation(s) supported by this factory
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultCapableLocalConfigStoreFactory, SimpleHadoopFilesystemConfigStoreFactory, SimpleHDFSConfigStoreFactory, SimpleLocalHDFSConfigStoreFactory

    @Alpha
public interface ConfigStoreFactory<T extends ConfigStore>
    ConfigStoreFactory is used to created ConfigStores. Each ConfigStoreFactory is responsible for instantiating ConfigStores that can handle specific config key URI scheme. Typically those ConfigStores correspond to different physical instances and are differentiated by the authority in the URI. The ConfigStoreFactory will typically also define a default ConfigStore which is to be used if no authority is specified in the config key URI.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createConfigStore(URI configKey)
      Obtains the ConfigStore to handle a specific config key.
      String getScheme() 

    • Method Detail

      • getScheme

        String getScheme()
        Returns:
        the URI scheme for which this configuration store factory is responsible. All the configuration store created by this configuration factory will share the same scheme name.

      • createConfigStore

        T createConfigStore(URI configKey)
             throws ConfigStoreCreationException
        Obtains the ConfigStore to handle a specific config key.
        Parameters:
        configKey - The URI of the config key that needs to be accessed.
        Returns:
        ConfigStore which can handle the specified config key. If the config key URI is missing the authority part, the factory may choose a default store if available or throw a ConfigStoreCreationException
        Throws:
        ConfigStoreCreationException - if the URI cannot be mapped to a config store
        IllegalArgumentException - if the scheme of the config key URI does not match the value of getScheme().
